titles.title: To amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to allow non-Federally insured credit unions to become members of a Federal Home Loan Bank.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises.

committee.subcommittee: Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises
committee.name: House Financial Services

bill.summary: 7/11/2012--Introduced. Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to make a state credit union eligible for membership in the Federal Home Loan Bank system.
